review: pros:+ fits the gen4-4.5 toyota camry for years 1997-2001 (non-leather steering wheel)+ wont fall off or slide off+ holds a burger/sandwich plus 1 small drink.+sturdy+great price (saves about $3 to $5+ compared to other models)cons:-doesn't have the space to put anything else, like fries or sides.-you will have to clean up before you move the desk, other wise you will spill your food crumbs on your legs.-it has some heft to it, you may want to store it in your seat back or trunk. if you get in a wreck its a flying projectile.-may only fit certain steering wheels, i know for sure it wont fit the flat bottom b8.5 s4 steering wheel. the wheel is so thick the gripping hooks wont even pass through, let alone "hang".
productTitle: Cutequeen Trading car 1pcs Eating/Laptop Steering Wheel Desk Black(pack of 1)
